sentences.en: " I baptized you with water; but He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit. "
sentences.cn: 可 1:8 我是用水给你们施洗、他却要用圣灵给你们施洗.

sentences.en: Baptism cannot be called a work because you cannot baptize yourself.
sentences.cn: 洗礼不能被称为做工,因为你不能为自己施洗.

sentences.en: He was baptized a Roman Catholic.
sentences.cn: 他受洗成为罗马天主教徒。

sentences.en: He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
sentences.cn: 他将以圣灵和火为你们施洗.

sentences.en: I baptize thee in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost.
sentences.cn: 我以圣父 、 圣子 、 圣灵的名义为你洗礼.

sentences.en: I baptize you with water for repentance.
sentences.cn: [太3:11]我是用水给你们施洗,叫你们悔改.

sentences.en: I baptize you with water, but he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit.
sentences.cn: 我是用水给你们施洗,他却要用圣灵给你们施洗.

sentences.en: I baptized you in water; But he shall baptize you in the Holy Spirit.
sentences.cn: 我用水给你们施洗, 他却要用圣灵给你们施洗.

sentences.en: I indeed have baptized you with water: but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost.
sentences.cn: 8我是用水给你们施洗,他却要用圣灵给你们施洗.

sentences.en: Most churches baptize infants but some insist on adult baptism.
sentences.cn: 大多数教堂给婴儿洗礼,但有一部分坚持给成人洗礼.

words.tran_cn: 施洗礼；使经受考验；给…名称（baptize的过去分词）
给…施浸礼；命名；使经受考验（等于baptise）

trans.tran_cn: 给…施浸礼；命名；使经受考验（等于baptise）
trans.tran_en: to perform the ceremony of baptism on someone

trans.tran_cn: 给…施洗礼，（施洗时）授…以教名，给…精神上的洗礼，使经受考验
